sentence.Network_en: They must be reborn into wholeness.

sentence.Network_en: Pens perceives many personalities as lacking wholeness, as being fragmented.

sentence.Network_en: It is in the wholeness that one remembers the truth.
sentence.Network_cn: 正是在整体中,一个人才能忆起真相.

entry.def: Wholeness is the quality of being complete or a single unit and not broken or divided into parts.

example.ex: ...the need for wholeness and harmony in mind, body and spirit.
example.tran: 保持头脑、身体和精神和谐统一的需要

means.word_mean: 1. an unreduced or unbroken completeness or totality
2. a state of robust good health
